alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 9:58PM EST until January 15 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Total snowfall accumulations of 8 to 15 inches near and north of Route 28 with locally higher amounts of 15 to 20 inches possible north of Stillwater Reservoir. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer and Hamilton counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Snowfall rates should diminish overnight tonight as the lake effect band lifts northward. Gusty winds will cause blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
